description.value: This is a one-time snapshot of the allowed SNOMED values for vaccines, retrieved in February 2023. Contents may need to be updated and readers should consult the documentation, found here http://hl7.org/fhir/uv/shc-vaccination/2021Sep/ValueSet-vaccine-snomed.html
